block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled RHP John Wasdin from Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Named Rene Gayo director of international scouting. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated C Todd Greene from the 15-day disabled list. Sent C Josh Phelps to Knoxville of the Southern League.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Recalled RHP John Wasdin from Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Named Rene Gayo director of international scouting. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Activated C Todd Greene from the 15-day disabled list. Sent C Josh Phelps to Knoxville of the Southern League.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed 3B Scott Thorman, SS Aaron Herr, SS Keoni De Renne, RHP Trey Hodges, 1B David LaRoche and RHP Chris Clark. CINCINNATI REDS--Moved OF Deion Sanders from the disabled list to the restricted list. HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed RHP Jay Powell on the 15-day disabled list. Activated RHP Mike Maddux from the 15-day disabled list. Signed SS Eric Brunlett, 1B Mark Hamilton, RHP Ryan Hamilton, 3B Nathan Nelson, 3B T.J. Soto, SS Tommy Whiteman and OF Henri Stanley. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Agreed to terms with RHP Joel Hanrahan, C Koyie Hill and RHP Heath Totten. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Signed RHP Hunter Gomez. MONTREAL EXPOS--Released C Charlie O'Brien. Activated C Lenny Webster from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned C Brian Schneider to Ottawa of International League.
National Basketball Association BOSTON CELTICS--Picked up the contract option of G-F Adrian Griffin.

National Football League NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Released DE Jon Harris. TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS--Signed S Jeff Popovich to a one-year contract. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Signed WR James Williams and DT Tim Watson.
National Hockey League EDMONTON OILERS--Promoted assistant coach Craig MacTavish to coach. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed G Evgeny Konstantinov to a three-year contract.

CUNY ATHLETIC CONFERENCE--Named Bruce Filosa president and Robert J. Coleman vice president for the 2000-01 and 2001-02 academic years. CAMPBELL--Named Patrick Ferguson women's soccer coach. CINCINNATI--Reinstated sophomore RB DeMarco McCleskey to the football team. COLGATE--Named James Wilroy assistant volleyball coach. DEPAUW--Named Jeff McMartin assistant football and track coach and Neil Kazmierczak assistant football coach and strength and conditioning coordinator. GREENSBORO--Named Bill Young assistant football coach. LOUISIANA TECH--Named Randy Bates defensive backs coach, Todd Howard linebackers coach, Todd Monken running back coach and recruiting coordinator, Pete Perot offensive line coach and Rob Spence quarterbacks coach and co-offensive coordinator. MARYLAND--Named Allison Jones women's assistant basketball coach and Beth Deskins women's basketball administrative assistant. MISSISSIPPI--Named Dan McDonnell assistant baseball coach. MISSISSIPPI STATE--Named Bo Reid assistant softball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-WILMINGTON--Named Ann Hancock women's basketball coach. RUTGERS--Named Bill Dirrigl men's lacrosse coach. SOUTH CAROLINA--Named Linda Hill-MacDonald women's assistant basketball coach. SPRING HILL--Named Annie Schaben women's assistant basketball coach. TEXAS-DALLAS--Named Terry Butterfield men's basketball coach. TEXAS--Named Michael Walker women's co-head swimming coach Promoted women's assistant basketball coach Karen Aston to women's associate head basketball coach. WAKE FOREST--Named Barry Sanderson men's assistant basketball coach.
